alert.note: Alert for Estill; Lee (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 21 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Estill and western Lee Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Evelyn, or 7 miles southeast of Irvine, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Pinnacle and Crystal around 605 PM EDT. Old Landing, Willow Shoals and Yellow Rock around 610 PM EDT. Whynot, Heidelberg and Caryton around 615 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Greeley, Belle Point, Mount Olive, Fixer, White Ash, Beattyville, Proctor and Corgleton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
